channel.title: Need help please!
channel.description: Ok, so basically I added a zombie minigame to my server and added a point shop, 1 problem.. When I put it into FileManager.java to save the points to the profile, all it does now is when you log out and back in your stats are reset and so is your gender. My base is a 508 palidino 76 Anybody help?!
